title: How to Make Cinnamon Cake

steps.headline: Grease a 20 centimeter (7.9 in)- round cake pan with, baking paper.
Beat the butter, sugar and vanilla extract together, until it turns creamy.
Add all the eggs, and beat them well.
Mix the, self-raising flour and plain flour together.
steps.description: Then add cinnamon and, stir it all together.

steps.headline: Fold in alternately with milk, in two batches.
Put it into the round cake pan, and smooth out the surface using a flat spoon.
Bake for one hour or more; depending on your oven.
steps.description: Keep checking, by inserting skewers into the center of the cake.

steps.headline: After, set it to cool in the pan for 15 to 20 minutes.
Carefully turn out, onto a wire rack.
Mix some "extra" sugar, cinnamon, and melted butter together.
Pour it all over the cake and set aside.

text: Set the oven to 170*C  Grease a 20 centimeter (7.9 in)- round cake pan with, baking paper.  Beat the butter, sugar and vanilla extract together, until it turns creamy.  Add all the eggs, and beat them well.  Mix the, self-raising flour and plain flour together. Then add cinnamon and, stir it all together. Fold in alternately with milk, in two batches.  Put it into the round cake pan, and smooth out the surface using a flat spoon.  Bake for one hour or more; depending on your oven. Keep checking, by inserting skewers into the center of the cake. After, set it to cool in the pan for 15 to 20 minutes.  Carefully turn out, onto a wire rack.  Mix some "extra" sugar, cinnamon, and melted butter together.  Pour it all over the cake and set aside.  Serve!
